section:
Maven settings Maven allows defining settings on a global, user and project level. The common case is to define on a user level settings like a proxy server or passwords to upload build artifacts to a server.
You can view the file locations in Eclipse via
Windows Preferences Maven User settings
.
Maven settings
The following settings.xml file defined a proxy server. If located in the .m2 folder of the users home directly, Maven will automatically use this proxy.
